title: Get us kids out of here (TEFC)
brief_description: A study of the context in which young people offend and some of the offences that they commit. The program is introduced by Laurie Taylor, Professor of Sociology at the University of York, and it includes contributions from a wide range of specialists in the subject, as well as the case histories of several young offenders.
